name: muffin
desc: Sweet muffin with chocolate sprinkles on the top. Tastes wonderful with a cup of fresh coffee.

name: croissant
desc: Flaky and buttery French pastry, perfect for breakfast or a snack.

name: donut
desc: Classic ring-shaped donut covered with pink glaze and colorful sprinkles.

name: pretzel
desc: Soft and salty pretzel with a golden brown crust, great with mustard or cheese dip.

name: brownie
desc: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownie with a crispy top and gooey center.

name: cheesecake
desc: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and a hint of vanilla.

name: granola bar
desc: Healthy granola bar packed with oats, nuts, and honey for a perfect energy boost.

name: macaron
desc: Delicate French macaron with a crispy shell and creamy filling, available in various flavors.

name: churros
desc: Crispy, fried dough sticks coated in cinnamon sugar, best served with hot chocolate.

name: popcorn
desc: Light and crunchy popcorn, freshly popped and lightly salted for a classic snack.
